alert.note: Alert for Madison; Marshall; Morgan (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 10:47PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Marshall, western Madison and southeastern Morgan Counties through 1145 PM CDT... At 1046 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a band of strong thunderstorm from north through south Huntsville, including Redstone Arsenal, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Very heavy downpours and occasional lightning. Ponding of water and minor street flooding is expected. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Huntsville, Madison, Moores Mill, Redstone Arsenal, Meridianville, Alabama A And M University, Marshall Space Flight Center, University Of Alabama In Huntsville, Morgan City and Valhermoso Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
